item.description:
The Exemplar Entertainment Industry Roundtable and Networking Group is a premier networking group where Entertainment Industry Professionals in film and music meet in mutual support to network, discuss, socialize, learn, and propose initiatives to help shape Boston's entertainment community. Join us for a fun and engaging evening with colleagues and peers. Space is limited, so please RSVP and be sure to attend if you reserve your spot!

SNACKS & BEVERAGES PROVIDED


Facilitator: Kim Leadford, J.D.
Vice President
Exemplar Entertainment, Inc
Exemplar Law Partners, LLC

Contact: 1-401-316-6513
item.name: Entertainment Industry Roundtable & Networking Group
